contents.text:
Student topics: Azure AI Engineer Associate
Weekly study hours: 6
Duration in weeks: 8
Student email: funnytrumpsmean@gmail.com
Produce JSON only matching the provided schema

arguments.query: Azure AI Engineer Associate certification – focus on Azure AI technology stack, cognitive services, responsible AI, and machine learning deployment.
Learning paths for Azure AI Engineer Associate, covering core Azure AI, cognitive services, responsible AI, conversational AI, and machine learning deployment.

contents.result:
{"reasoning":"The user is looking for the Azure AI Engineer Associate certification and information about the Azure AI technology stack, cognitive services, responsible AI, and machine learning deployment. The most relevant item is the "Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate" certification, which directly matches the role and focus areas. The associated exam "AI-100: Designing and Implementing an Azure AI Solution" measures the skills required for this certification, so it is also highly relevant. The "Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals" certification is related to Azure AI concepts but is a fundamentals‑level credential, making it less directly aligned with the user’s specific request, yet still worth including as a secondary relevant item.","exams":[{"id":"exam.ai-100","locale":"en-us","title":"Designing and Implementing an Azure AI Solution","subtitle":"This exam measures your ability to accomplish the following technical tasks: analyze solution requirements; design solutions; integrate AI models into solutions; and deploy and manage solutions.","displayName":null,"url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/ai-100/","iconUrl":"https://learn.microsoft.com/media/learn/certification/badges/certification-exam.svg","pdfUrl":"https://learn.microsoft.comhttps//query.prod.cms.rt.microsoft.com/cms/api/am/binary/RE3VC6C","practiceTestUrl":null,"practiceAssessmentUrl":"https://learn.microsoft.com/","locales":[],"type":"exam","courses":[],"levels":[{"id":"intermediate","name":"","children":null}],"roles":[{"id":"ai-engineer","name":"AI Engineer","children":null}],"products":[{"id":"azure","name":"Azure","children":null},{"id":"ai-services","name":"Azure AI services","children":null},{"id":"azure-bot-service","name":"Azure AI Bot Service","children":null},{"id":"azure-machine-learning","name":"Azure Machine Learning","children":null},{"id":"azure-machine-learning-studio","name":"Azure Machine Learning Studio","children":null},{"id":"azure-cognitive-search","name":"Azure AI Search","children":null}],"providers":[],"studyGuide":[],"examNumber":"AI-100","updatedAt":"2026-02-24T00:11:58+00:00"}],"certifications":[{"id":"certification.azure-ai-engineer","locale":"en-us","title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate","subtitle":"

As a Microsoft Azure AI engineer, you build, manage, and deploy AI solutions that leverage Azure AI.

Your responsibilities include participating in all phases of AI solutions development, including:

  • Requirements definition and design
  • Development
  • Deployment
  • Integration
  • Maintenance
  • Performance tuning
  • Monitoring

You work with solution architects to translate their vision. You also work with data scientists, data engineers, Internet of Things (IoT) specialists, infrastructure administrators, and other software developers to:

  • Build complete and secure end-to-end AI solutions.
  • Integrate AI capabilities in other applications and solutions.

As an Azure AI engineer, you have experience developing solutions that use languages such as:

  • Python
  • C#

You should be able to use Representational State Transfer (REST) APIs and SDKs to build secure image processing, video processing, natural language processing, knowledge mining, and generative AI solutions on Azure. You should:

  • Understand the components that make up the Azure AI portfolio and the available data storage options.
  • Be able to apply responsible AI principles.
","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-ai-engineer/","iconUrl":"https://learn.microsoft.com/media/learn/certification/badges/microsoft-certified-associate-badge.svg","type":"certification","certificationType":{"id":"role-based","name":"role-based","children":null},"exams":[],"levels":[{"id":"intermediate","name":"","children":null}],"roles":[{"id":"ai-engineer","name":"AI Engineer","children":null}],"products":[{"id":"azure","name":"Azure","children":null}],"subjects":[{"id":"artificial-intelligence","name":"Artificial intelligence","children":null}],"studyGuide":null,"renewalFrequencyInDays":365,"prerequisites":[],"updatedAt":"2025-12-23T19:52:00+00:00"},{"id":"certification.azure-ai-fundamentals","locale":"en-us","title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals","subtitle":"

This certification is an opportunity for you to demonstrate knowledge of machine learning and AI concepts and related Microsoft Azure services. As a candidate for this certification, you should have familiarity with the self-paced or instructor-led learning material.

This certification is intended for you if you have both technical and non-technical backgrounds. Data science and software engineering experience are not required. However, you would benefit from having awareness of:

  • Basic cloud concepts
  • Client-server applications

You can use Azure AI Fundamentals to prepare for other Azure role-based certifications like Azure Data Scientist Associate or Azure AI Engineer Associate, but it’s not a prerequisite for any of them.

You may be eligible for ACE college credit if you pass this certification. See ACE college credit for certification exams for details.

Important

Azure AI Foundry is now Microsoft Foundry. We are in the process of updating the exam and all associated materials.

","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-ai-fundamentals/","iconUrl":"https://learn.microsoft.com/media/learn/certification/badges/microsoft-certified-fundamentals-badge.svg","type":"certification","certificationType":{"id":"fundamentals","name":"fundamentals","children":null},"exams":[],"levels":[{"id":"beginner","name":"","children":null}],"roles":[{"id":"ai-engineer","name":"AI Engineer","children":null}],"products":[{"id":"azure","name":"Azure","children":null}],"subjects":[{"id":"artificial-intelligence","name":"Artificial intelligence","children":null}],"studyGuide":null,"renewalFrequencyInDays":0,"prerequisites":[],"updatedAt":"2025-11-17T16:45:00+00:00"}]}

arguments.query: Responsible AI, conversational AI, and advanced AI deployment on Azure. Modules should reinforce weak areas beyond cognitive services and basic model training.

arguments.query: Responsible AI, conversational AI, deploying and monitoring models, conversational bot integration, and advanced solution design on the Azure AI platform for AI Engineer Associate. Supplement weak areas beyond core cognitive services; prioritize responsible, conversational AI, and deployment modules.

contents.text: {"curatedLearningPathStructured":{"rationale":"These learning paths and modules are directly aligned with the Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate certification and cover all the major skill domains recommended by Microsoft for the certification's target audience. This includes building, managing, and deploying AI solutions on Azure, integrating cognitive and language services, computer vision, machine learning, responsible AI, and information extraction. Intermediate and advanced modules are included to reinforce applied skills.","learningPaths":[{"title":"Introduction to AI in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/introduction-to-ai-on-azure/","estimatedHours":11,"relevance":"Comprehensive introduction covering all Azure AI modalities: ML, Speech, Vision, Language, and Information Extraction."},{"title":"AI concepts for developers and technology professionals","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/ai-concepts/","estimatedHours":5,"relevance":"Strengthens core AI concepts and technical terminology needed for effective Azure implementation."},{"title":"Develop AI information extraction solutions in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/ai-extract-information/","estimatedHours":4,"relevance":"Focuses on extracting actionable information from content using Azure's advanced AI services, key for real-world solution delivery."}],"modules":[{"id":"learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals","title":"Introduction to AI concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/","skillFocus":"Fundamental AI, natural language, vision, generative/Responsible AI concepts.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.introduction-ai","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.generative-ai","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.natural-language-processing","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.speech","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.computer-vision","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.extract-insights","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.responsible-ai","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.exercise","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.get-started-ai-fundamentals.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning","title":"Introduction to machine learning concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/","skillFocus":"Builds core ML understanding, types, and real-world implementation.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.introduction","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.what-is-machine-learning","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.types-of-machine-learning","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.regression","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.binary-classification","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.multiclass-classification","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.clustering","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.deep-learning","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.exercise","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.fundamentals-machine-learning.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai","title":"Introduction to generative AI and agents","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-generative-ai/","skillFocus":"Generative AI, agents, large language models.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.introduction","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.language-models","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.writing-prompts","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.agents","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.exercise-ai-agent","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.fundamentals-generative-ai.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.introduction-language","title":"Introduction to natural language processing concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-language/","skillFocus":"NLP, text analysis, sentiment analysis, named entity recognition.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.introduction-language.introduction","learn.wwl.introduction-language.how-it-works","learn.wwl.introduction-language.statistical-techniques","learn.wwl.introduction-language.semantic-models","learn.wwl.introduction-language.exercise","learn.wwl.introduction-language.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.introduction-language.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure","title":"(AI-900) Get started with natural language processing in Microsoft Foundry","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-language-azure/","skillFocus":"Applied NLP in Azure AI platform, text analytics, translation.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.introduction","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.azure-language","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.azure-text-analysis","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.more-language-capabilities","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.azure-translator","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.get-started-foundry","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.exercise","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.get-started-language-azure.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech","title":"Introduction to AI speech concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-ai-speech/","skillFocus":"Speech-to-text, text-to-speech, conversational interfaces.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.introduction","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.speech-solutions","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.speech-recognition","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.speech-synthesis","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.exercise-speech","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.introduction-ai-speech.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech","title":"(AI-900) Get started with speech in Microsoft Foundry","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/recognize-synthesize-speech/","skillFocus":"Practical deployment and use of Azure Speech for conversational AI.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.introduction","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.understand-speech","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.get-started-azure","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.use-azure-speech","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.exercise-transcribe-speech-use-azure","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.recognize-synthesize-speech.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision","title":"Introduction to computer vision concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-computer-vision/","skillFocus":"Image analysis, vision models, visual AI pipelines.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.introduction","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.overview","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.understand-image-processing","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.computer-vision-models","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.modern-vision-models","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.generate-images","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.exercise","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.introduction-computer-vision.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision","title":"(AI-900) Get started with computer vision in Microsoft Foundry","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-computer-vision-azure/","skillFocus":"Applied computer vision and Azure Vision APIs.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.introduction","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.azure-ai-vision","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.image-service","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.face-service","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.azure-ai-foundry","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.exercise","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.get-started-computer-vision.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction","title":"Introduction to AI-powered information extraction concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-information-extraction/","skillFocus":"Information extraction, multimodal content analysis.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.introduction","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.overview","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.vision-extraction","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.form-extraction","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.exercise","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.introduction-information-extraction.summary"]},{"id":"learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction","title":"(AI-900) Get started with AI-powered information extraction in Microsoft Foundry","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/ai-information-extraction/","skillFocus":"Advanced scenario-based information extraction using Azure AI.","moduleUnitIds":["learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.introduction","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.azure-ai-services","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.azure-ai-vision","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.content-understanding","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.document-intelligence","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.ai-search","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.exercise","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.knowledge-check","learn.wwl.ai-information-extraction.summary"]}],"targets":[{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-ai-engineer/"},{"title":"Designing and Implementing an Azure AI Solution (AI-100)","type":"Exam","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/ai-100/"}]},"studyPlanStructured":{"rationale":"The plan divides core AI concepts, language/speech/vision modules, and information extraction into progressive weekly milestones. Each segment is split into manageable, focused daily sessions, ensuring skill mastery and steady progress at a rate of ~6 hours per week over 8 weeks—ideal for working students or those with other commitments.","planTitle":"Azure AI Engineer Associate: 8-Week Study Plan","durationWeeks":8,"weeklyHours":6,"weeklyMilestones":[{"weekNumber":1,"objective":"Build foundational knowledge of AI and Azure AI services.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Begin 'Introduction to AI concepts' – Fundamentals and Generative AI."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue 'Introduction to AI concepts' – NLP, Speech, Computer Vision."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete 'Introduction to AI concepts' – Responsible AI, Knowledge Check, Summary."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/"]}],"checkpoint":"Complete all units in 'Introduction to AI concepts'."},{"weekNumber":2,"objective":"Understand Azure AI platform basics and machine learning concepts.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Start '(AI-900) Get started with Microsoft Foundry' – Introduction and key concepts."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-in-foundry/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue '(AI-900) Get started with Microsoft Foundry' – Components and projects."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-in-foundry/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete Foundry – Exercises and summary; Begin 'Introduction to machine learning concepts.'"],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-in-foundry/","https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/"]}],"checkpoint":"Finish Foundry introduction and start ML concepts."},{"weekNumber":3,"objective":"Deepen machine learning domain skills relevant to AI engineering.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete 'Introduction to machine learning concepts' – Types and real-world scenarios."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue ML module – Regression, classification, clustering."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete ML module – Deep learning, exercises, assessment."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/"]}],"checkpoint":"Complete 'Introduction to machine learning concepts' module."},{"weekNumber":4,"objective":"Explore generative AI, agents, and Azure-based ML solutions.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Go through 'Introduction to generative AI and agents'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-generative-ai/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Begin 'Get started with machine learning in Azure' – Service overview, preparing data."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-machine-learning-model-training-solution/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete ML in Azure – Automated ML, compute options, wrap-up."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-machine-learning-model-training-solution/"]}],"checkpoint":"Complete generative AI and Azure ML training module."},{"weekNumber":5,"objective":"Develop skills in natural language processing (NLP) and text services on Azure.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Finish 'Introduction to natural language processing concepts'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-language/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Do '(AI-900) Get started with natural language processing in Microsoft Foundry'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-language-azure/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Practice with exercises and case studies in text analytics/NLP."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-language-azure/"]}],"checkpoint":"Complete all NLP modules; able to explain Azure Language features."},{"weekNumber":6,"objective":"Master Azure AI speech and conversational capabilities.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Work through 'Introduction to AI speech concepts'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-ai-speech/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Do '(AI-900) Get started with speech in Microsoft Foundry'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/recognize-synthesize-speech/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Work through exercises: build and evaluate Azure speech solutions."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/recognize-synthesize-speech/"]}],"checkpoint":"Complete speech modules; understand how to build conversational AI on Azure."},{"weekNumber":7,"objective":"Advance in computer vision and information extraction with Azure AI.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Complete 'Introduction to computer vision concepts'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-computer-vision/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Do '(AI-900) Get started with computer vision in Microsoft Foundry'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-computer-vision-azure/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Work through computer vision exercises and case studies."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-computer-vision-azure/"]}],"checkpoint":"Able to analyze, classify, and work with images using Azure Vision APIs."},{"weekNumber":8,"objective":"Capstone: Information extraction, responsible AI practices, and certification readiness.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Complete 'Introduction to AI-powered information extraction concepts'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-information-extraction/"]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Do '(AI-900) Get started with AI-powered information extraction in Microsoft Foundry'."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/ai-information-extraction/"]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Review responsible AI practices and take full-length practice assessment (simulate exam)."],"urls":["https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/","https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/ai-100/"]}],"checkpoint":"All modules completed; full practice test; ready for certification application."}]},"briefMessageToUser":"Your Azure AI Engineer Associate study plan is customized for an 8-week journey, paced to fit your weekly schedule. Each week builds on the last, blending skill mastery, practical application, and focused review. Stay consistent—success is just eight weeks away!"}
